name: Modi
description: Modi (Old Norse: Móði, Nordic: ᛗᛟᛞᛁ) also known as Modi Thorson (Translation: Modi, Son of Thor) was the Norse God of Courage and Wrath. Son of Thor and an unknown woman, the nephew of Baldur, the younger half-brother of Magni, and older half-brother of Thrúd. He is the secondary antagonist of God of War (2018). Modi and his half-brother both followed their uncle Baldur in their quest to find and kill Kratos and Atreus.

biographicalInformation.status: Deceased (Stabbed in the neck and pushed off a platform by Loki)
